name: Plantopia - Merge Garden
description:
Welcome to Plantopia!

The very first merge game where you can grow your own Dream Garden, and learn how to make organic products out of the plants you grow.

MERGE & UNLOCK MULTIPLE BOARDS
Explore the greenhouse, toolshed and DIY Flower Factory, with more than 500 beautiful objects to be found.

GROW & NURTURE UNIQUE PLANTS
Explore the charming world of plants.

CRAFT ORGANIC PRODUCTS
Create your own organic products from the plants you grow!

EXPAND AND DECORATE YOUR GARDEN
Expand your gardening business, earn cash, grow your dream garden.
